description: This file defines an Angular service 'NotesService' that manages CRUD operations for notes and tags via HTTP API calls, utilizing signals for reactive data handling.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Angular injectable service providing CRUD operations for notes and tags, using signals to manage reactive state.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes, optionally filtered by a query parameter, updates the notes signal.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with the provided payload and updates the notes list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new data and updates the notes list.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID and updates the notes list.

methods.name: fetchTags
methods.description: Fetches all tags and updates the tags signal.

methods.name: createTag
methods.description: Creates a new tag with the provided payload and updates the tags list.

ctags.name: arr
ctags.pattern: /^        const arr = this.notesSignal().map(x => x.id === id ? n : x);$/
